pages.text: The normal morph is the default look for a ball python.$(br)$(li)Head: Mostly dark brown with lighter stripes running through the eyes.$(li)Body: Mostly light brown with a dark broken-up stripe down the spine and dark spots in the alien heads.$(li)Belly: Pale.

pages.title: Normal
pages.text: Type: Base$(funfact)This morph is also known as 'wild type' or, occasionally, 'classic'.$()
